net.tridentsdk.effect.particle

Interface ParticleEffect

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Effect<ParticleEffectType>, RemoteEffect<ParticleEffectType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TridentParticleEffect

    public interface ParticleEffect
extends RemoteEffect<ParticleEffectType>
    Represents a particle effect
    Since:
    0.4-alpha
    Author:
    The TridentSDK Team

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int count()
      Returns the count of how many particles will be spawned
      int[] data()
      Returns the data of the particle
      boolean longDistance()
      Returns whether the particle should be long distance
      Vector offset()
      Returns the offset for each particle
      void setCount(int count)
      Set the count how many of the effects should be spawned
      void setData(int[] data)
      Set the data of the particle
      Only used for ICON_CRACK, BLOCK_CRACK and BLOCK_DUST
      ICON_CRACK requires array of two integers
      BLOCK_CRACK and BLOCK_DUST requires an array of a single integer
      void setLongDistance(boolean longDistance)
      Set the particle to be long distance
      Increases distance from 256 to 65536
      void setOffset(Vector offset)
      The randomized offset for each particle
      If multiple particles are spawned, this will be re-run for each

      • Methods inherited from interface net.tridentsdk.effect.RemoteEffect

        setPosition

      • Methods inherited from interface net.tridentsdk.effect.Effect

        apply, apply, applyToEveryoneExcept, setType, type

    • Method Detail

      • setCount

        void setCount(int count)
        Set the count how many of the effects should be spawned
        Parameters:
        count - The count how many should be spawned

      • setLongDistance

        void setLongDistance(boolean longDistance)
        Set the particle to be long distance
        Increases distance from 256 to 65536
        Parameters:
        longDistance - Whether the particle should be long distance

      • setData

        void setData(int[] data)
        Set the data of the particle
        Only used for ICON_CRACK, BLOCK_CRACK and BLOCK_DUST
        ICON_CRACK requires array of two integers
        BLOCK_CRACK and BLOCK_DUST requires an array of a single integer
        Parameters:
        data - Data of the particle

      • setOffset

        void setOffset(Vector offset)
        The randomized offset for each particle
        If multiple particles are spawned, this will be re-run for each
        Parameters:
        offset - The offset for each particle
